website_summaries.verdict: August's bundled Smart Lock Pro is a great option if you want tons of integrations at your disposal, but anyone craving a simpler lock should look elsewhere.
pros: Your August Smart Lock Pro purchase includes a DIY smart lock, a Connect Wi-Fi module and a DoorSense open/close sensor -- all for $279
The Pro also supports Z-Wave (hub not included) and works with Amazon Alexa speakers, the Google Home, Apple HomeKit and Nest
cons: You can't buy the Pro as a standalone lock in stores
Z-Wave customers/anyone not interested in the Connect accessory must go through August's list of professional dealers

customer_reviews.title: Poor connection
customer_reviews.text: Device couldn't connect stable to even their own equipment. I am teach technology courses so it is not a user issue. Update 8/22/18, according to August Home they are having android issues with certain models of phones. They are working with the android community to address these problems. So, if you have Apple, you should fare better.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with double-cylinder deadbolts
customer_reviews.text: We wanted to retrofit our existing Schalge double-cylinder (keyed on both sides, in and out) with the August lock on the inside. We figured this would be a great way to move to smart lock features and at the same time convert to a turn lock on the inside. Unfortunately, after speaking with August customer service it was confirmed that they do not have the proper adapters for this type of setup. The August website was not explicit in this lack of compatibility when we researched the purchase. Now the product has to be returned. It would be great if August could develop adapters for double-cylinder deadbolts and include them in the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Forum

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with Kwikset
customer_reviews.text: For Kwikset locks, you will need to order the Kwikset 81706 2-1/4" Thick Door Installation Kit for all Kwikset and Signature since the Kwikset screws are not long enough. I called August support and they only have longer screws for Schlage locks.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Sanford

customer_reviews.title: August wont honor warranty if not purchased from them directly.
customer_reviews.text: Beware buying this lock from Amazon or any vendor if you expect August to honor the 1 year warranty. I purchased the 3rd Gen smart lock from Amazon and 9 months later today, the lock has problems locking/unlocking my door. I removed the lock from the door and I could tell that it was defective. There's resistance when you rotate the lock manually. I contacted August abd they said they only issue RMA for products bought directly from their site. If you look at the description on Amazon, it says 1 year warranty from Manufacturer. Stay away from this company. Now its time to file a report to the BBB.
customer_reviews.author: xodium

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation, nice looking look. Good battery
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy it is to install this lock. It took me about 30 minutes to install it with my existing deadbolt. The software set up part took another 15 minutes and the instruction from the app was really easy to follow. I like the aesthetic of the lock. I don't want stranger to know I have a smart lock, so this is the perfect lock for me. Using Alexa to lock and unlock is easy. For security purposes, unlock cannot be in the "then" statement of any of your routine. I unlock/open, close/lock on average 9-10 times a day and the lock last about 6 months for me.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Vo

customer_reviews.title: Horrible lock - keep looking for another lock
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the worst purchases I have made on Amazon. The device rarely locked on its own. It frequently got stuck. It developed a grinding with any turn of the lock. It rarely unlocked when walking within the vicinity despite having the app on my phone. Attempted to contact support given it was under warranty and they blamed me for the malfunction. Informed me that the device could not be replaced despite being under warranty. Do not believe anything on their warranty. I strongly advise walking away from this purchase as it will cause you problems.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Verlasky

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive to break in less than a year!!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give it 0 stars. It broke a few days after the return period. The mechanism inside kept getting jammed, leaving my kids locked out, which defeated the main purpose of purchasing a smart lock. This device is entirely too expensive to last less than a year of installation. Also requires frequent battery changes, which is not ideal for a device that controls entry into your home.
customer_reviews.author: James Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use, broke down after 10 months, poor technical support
customer_reviews.text: The August lock lasted 10 months before it broke internally. The lock was difficult to use. The lock wouldn’t lock or unlock despite turning the external components. After spending 40 minutes with the August Technical support they misdiagnosed... then they mailed a replacement part after three days even though this lock was being used for my front door. The part sent didn’t fix the issue. Just switch to the Schlage encode. This lock is much smooth and very easy to operate and install.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Z

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 months, no support
customer_reviews.text: This was great for a hot minute, then it started having issues and eventually didn’t work at all. At first, it would struggle to lock and unlock and would keep trying, but would take a few extra minutes to get into our home. Then a couple months later, it just quit. Support is a joke and I haven’t received any help with it, so it’s basically $225 down the drain. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tiara

customer_reviews.title: I replace the batteries every two weeks and the bluetooth signal is awful
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could return it but it's already installed, working and I missed the cutoff to return it. I just have to keep rechargeable batteries because they die every two weeks. This is a condo with a metal door frame. I've tried widening the hole so it won't rub but the main culprit seems to be a motor that doesn't learn to stop. The stupid thing is so expensive that I refuse to sell it at a loss. I still tend to use my key because I don't want to deal with replacing the batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Works flawlessly for me
customer_reviews.text: This works so well I bought the August home video doorbell to pair with it. My front door doesn't always latch completely unless you pull it hard. Sometime the wind can blow the door open if kids or neighbors don't realize the door isn't completely latched allowing our dogs to escape. The August Smart Lock Pro automatically locks the deadbolt as soon as our door closes so the door can't blow open as well as notifying our phones if the door has been left open. Problem solved, no more dogs wondering away. I would recommend. It works especially well when integrated with the August Video Doorbell.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff’s reviews

customer_reviews.title: Big & ugly..
customer_reviews.text: It's not actually a deadbolt... it is just mechanism that turns the bolt.. so if you don't have an existing deadbolt.. you'll need to buy one. We can't get it to connect to Alexa. I've tried several times.. and I have smart lights, smart plugs, thermostat, security cameras, doorbells, roomba... even an oil diffuser... all integrated just fine so I am pretty sure it's not a user issue. I also don't like the fact that you have to give guests owner status to be able to unlock with bluetooth. I'm sorry I went with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Pinktique

customer_reviews.title: Installation was easy overall. We purchased this lock so we could ...
customer_reviews.text: After messing with it for about 4 hours, I finally got it to connect with my internet. The connect is about 15 ft away from the door and about 20 feet away and downstairs from the internet modem. It was hard to set up, but it works. Installation was easy overall. We purchased this lock so we could open the door from our phones. My elderly grandfather moved in and he needs a home nurse to visit once in a while when we are at work. The lock is great for regulating who and when someone is coming in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but........
customer_reviews.text: Not having the ability to adjust the away mode distance for auto lock, no obvious way to check battery level and the inability to change lock settings outside of bluetooth range (30 feet or less) leaves alot to be desired BUT doesn't affect the lock's functionality. It was unexpectedly easy to install and does exactly what it was made to do. The complaints above can be addressed through software updates if August so chooses to do so. 3/5 stars until then.
customer_reviews.author: Chance Ill

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research and decided to buy this Smart Lock. I had to call and get help setting it up and they could not have been nicer. He walked me through the steps and stayed online to make sure the locked was working correctly. I love that when I come home the Smart lock will open up on its own. Also, the "Alexa" capability is awesome. I created a routine so when I say "Alexa Good Night" and the lights cut off and the Smart Lock locks the door (if it was unlocked). Not hard to install at all. You can easily uninstall it and take it with you when you move.
customer_reviews.author: Aulorenzo

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Product
customer_reviews.text: I research this item for a year before deciding to buy. All the reviews very pretty good. After buying this product and installing it, it was terrible. The lock would only turn the deadbolt about a 1/3 of the way. Prior to installing, there was no issues with turning the deadbolt manually. Nothing obstructing the lock. It was smooth from opening to closing. No matter what adjustments I try to do, the lock would still only turn the deadbolt 1/3. Doing more research recently, this appears to be very common trend with the August Smart Lock. I wouldn't recommend this to anyone. This is why I have return the lock for a full refund with Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Ed K

customer_reviews.title: Waited for a long time...
customer_reviews.text: I waited for a long time for products in this category to mature and finally jumped in. So sorry I did. This is probably the best rated of all the smart-lock offerings (in 2019) and yet the product failed over and over. Twice, it literally locked us in the house with no recourse; the deadbolt was locked shut and manual turning of the unit wasn't working! Not safe! Returned product and will wait for another generation before jumping in again.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff H.

customer_reviews.title: Failed after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the smart lock and it worked well with Homekit only needing attention a few times in 4 months. It was easy to install and I like the auto-lock feature. Yesterday, almost 4 months to the day or installation, it failed. There is a grinding sound coming from inside the lock and it get's stuck in several spots when turning the august lock even when removed from the door. I called support and they are going to repair/replace it, but still I expect at least several years out of a $200+ home device.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S

customer_reviews.title: Connect box no longer works after 20 months
customer_reviews.text: Have had this lock for 20 months now. The connect box (which allows the lock to connect to wifi) no longer works. August only offers a 1 year warranty on the box, so I am forced to spend $80 for a new connect box. Unacceptable. As far as the lock, it is big and bulky. Like others have mentioned, the Auto-Unlock feature can be delayed for a period of time (which means you are left standing infront of your door, waiting for it to unlock). They seem to be having software updates for IOS come out every few weeks so maybe they are working on it? But after 20 months, you think the issue would have been solved by now......
customer_reviews.author: BoDEAN

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup and something you won’t be able to live without
customer_reviews.text: 10/10 - easy tutorial, easy install with a solid app(only requires screw driver). Pairs well with Alexa - I would not recommended ever enabling voice unlock. (Default is off for good security reasons) You can also create useful Alexa commands/routines with the lock - I personally have “goodnight” to shutoff all the lights and lock up. The final feature I found I found highly useful that hasn’t been mentioned too much is the app has the ability to log and notify the user who and when someone open/closes the door, lock/ unlocks the door and even if the door if left open - essentially a door chime that can be monitored remotely. Anyways, groceries are heavy.
customer_reviews.author: researchonly

customer_reviews.title: Confirm hardware type before purchasing
customer_reviews.text: Just horrible. this product does not work with all Kwikset locks. Kwikset locks are not all the same. Exterior lock has a pin that comes in and is not centered with the bolt mechanism. The interior lock turnknob has a pin that is centered and has a lower mechanism that the exterior rod fits in, so when the key is turned from the outside, it turns the interior mechanism to unlock the door. August does not fit this scheme, because it's looking for a center pin to turn that comes from the exterior lock.
customer_reviews.author: Garron Richardson

customer_reviews.title: If the auto unlock would work it would be great.  DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for over a year and so far, the auto unlock feature only works about 20% of the time (at the high end). It's absolute hot trash garbage. August seems uninterested in making it better, fixing the problems, or caring about customers. I really, really want to love this lock because when it works it is perfect, especially if you can't re-key your lock (e.g., you rent). Unfortunately, they can't get it to work right so please, I beg you, don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Bored Dad is Bored

customer_reviews.title: DONT DO IT
customer_reviews.text: I've had the "lock" for about 5 months now and I dont think I've hated a product so much in my life. The lock CONSTANTLY freezes up and wont work with the app. It requires a reset almost every month and most of the time the lock recalibration doesnt work at all. I'm tired of constantly needing to use my key cause it simply wont reliably work. I was hesitant to switch cause I didn't want to lose my money buy I want a working product. Switching brands. Save your money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: After many hours I was told  by support it has issues with Google Pixel 3 phone
customer_reviews.text: It constantly looses sync and flashes "unknown". When i remove the battery and put it back, it works for a while. Tech support tried to tell me it is because I have a google pixel phone but my wife has the same results on her iphone 8. When it works it is very nice but I have had mine about a week and have and to play with it EVERY day. I am returning it to amazon and will try the Schlage Encode Smart
customer_reviews.author: Ben Cabell

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this lock has too many issues.
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst lock I have ever bought. It worked well to start with as time went on it had issues with auto locking and auto unlocking Then it began to not unlock at all regardless of using the app or even manually. It locked me in my house on several occasions. It even refused to turn manually in those cases. At this point it doesn't work at all. I have removed the batteries and can use it as a standard lock. Only had the lock since December!
customer_reviews.author: Aztchr

customer_reviews.title: There is a problem
customer_reviews.text: It works fine and the integration is excellent plus it was easy to install. The only thing wrong is that you cannot change the name once you put it in (ios). Even their support can't do it. I am waiting for their response but I do not think it's coming. I love the auto locking. Another small problem is when you are coming up to the door and you are video chatting on the phone it doesn't open until you stop talking.
customer_reviews.author: Silver Surfer

customer_reviews.title: Loved It until we purchased additional August Locks
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the August lock and connect almost a year ago. We have really liked the lock. It has been great. I just purchased two more locks for our house and still like the main door lock, but found out the connect only works on one lock. Really??? So we have to purchase one connect for each August lock while also using up additional outlet plugs. That is ridiculous. I would have give the lock five stars had it not been for price gouging with the connect.
customer_reviews.author: Mick

customer_reviews.title: Good, but poor battery life
customer_reviews.text: So easy to install that I could do it, and lives up to that I wanted. I just have two issues: 1. It's kind of a kludge chain. I think its base communication is bluetooth, but if you want to extend it to WiFi (for Alexa), you have to get the connect module. 2. Being on a swinging door, having a wired power supply isn't going to happen, so it's battery powered (4xAA... or is it AAA?). I've had this for four months and I've already replaced them twice. Maybe if I moved the WiFi connect module physically closer, I could improve that, but probably not by much. At least it pops up warnings when the battery gets low
customer_reviews.author: Dr. CurmudgeonTop Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: Stop working within 30 days
customer_reviews.text: Within 30 days the lock has failed. I have had to send in for a replacement that honestly I'm not certain I should have done. Plastic goes around the inside locking mechanism that connects to the dead bolt. That did not give me a real feeling of security, Maybe if it was made out of metal it will not have went into critical failure. But for the price and then having the lock fail Within that short of a time period is unacceptable. Furthermore Internet connectivity to the lock, Is patchy at best. I'm thinking I should have went with a yale.
customer_reviews.author: masterdecoy

customer_reviews.title: Great customer support. Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I had problems installing and using the app. Both of which were my fault and customer service was very helpful in walking me through it. If you have problems with the app such as in my case not seeing my device even thou I installed it. Or having problems connecting to it. Restart your phone. Also had a problem mounting the device. I totally removed it and notice it was going in at an angle once I reassembled the unit and hand tighten the screws I can easily close the wings. Recommend the product and customer support is really good even at 8pm CST :)
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Spectacular
customer_reviews.text: I just received my smart locker today. It was very easy to install, not a monster of 7 heads at all, it took me about 10 minutes to install all by myself. I was looking for something that would hook me off of the leaving a key under the mat which is extremely unsafe, and something that would be easy to install as well, something that wouldn’t require me to change my whole door lock and that’s it, I found it. I can lock and unlock my door with my phone and I can even add family members and guests so they’ll be able to lock and unlock the door too. I am super happy with my purchase, five stars!
customer_reviews.author: Rebeca Matias

customer_reviews.title: Does not fully lock
customer_reviews.text: Door won't fully lock all the time says locked and shows locked in the app but only moves 1/4 into the door jam. I reached out to August they said reset the gear but still did the same. Also today it's clicking and say the lock has malfunctioned and ticking .
customer_reviews.author: phillip

customer_reviews.title: A great integrated smart lock!
customer_reviews.text: I have this lock integrated into my google home and it has been amazing. The only thing I would change is that I would have made this a bit more slim. Here are a few pros and cons: Pros: - Easy to install - Convenient, especially with a doorbell cam - Leaves ability to use your original key - Can manually turn the lock if batteries run out - Integrates with IFTTT - Works great with Google Home Cons: - Slightly bulky Overall, I’m very pleased with this lock package. This is a seamless integration into a smart home. This has been an excellent purchase and I fully recommend for ease, convenience, and safety.
customer_reviews.author: B. G.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love my August Lock! It took 5-10 minutes to install. Anyone can install it. Works perfectly! Great purchase! After reviewing all locks I chose August and I’m not sorry. Edit 10/3/20 - have owned this for 1 1/2 years and just now got a low battery alarm. I don’t use it often since I use my garage door mostly but probably average 1-2 times a day. It has worked perfectly...........perfectly. I did not install the door ajar button as I didn’t feel being single I needed it. It’s a solid product. Still a 5 star!
customer_reviews.author: Trip

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy, it's faulty by design.
customer_reviews.text: This thing almost never auto-unlocks. The programming is just all wrong. Instead of a geofence design where if you are close to your "home" location on the map, it engages, or even once you connect to your home wifi it opens, it attempts to use bluetooth/wifi combo that fails more times than it works. Thing is only good for auto-lock on a timer feature. I've sent support multiple emails, and nothing. Their site outage for support is even removed, likely because their product is trash and they know it and won't fix it. Would return but I'm outside the window so I guess I'm stuck with this junk.
customer_reviews.author: HonestReviewGuy

customer_reviews.title: Great Smart Lock
customer_reviews.text: Great lock, uses the existing deadbolt and keyed exterior side. The only thing I didn’t like was I still had to slightly modify the deadbolt attachment. Even though they send (3) and my deadbolt was one of the listed compatible it still required a modification. Other than that the install is good. The app works well and so does the Auto Unlock and lock features. Just wish there was a shorter time for auto lock. 30 secs is currently the min. Enough time for someone to tailgate behind you and enter your home. You can still manually lock the door after your self. The log is a great feature as well. Hopefully the app has an update coming.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money. Mine worked for about two weeks.
customer_reviews.text: A product with more than 2000 reviews and a good rating ought to be good. But that is not the case with this smart lock. I would say that this lock looks aesthetically pleasant (see pictures) and is very easy to install and setup. I loved using it with Alexa and the auto-lock feature was awesome. But the fun lasted for about two weeks. It stopped working after that or work erratically. Auto-lock was a hit and miss. And Alexa commands would work only occasionally. Sometimes the deadbolt would remain stuck. I would not recommend wasting your money on this lock and look for some other viable alternative. This is not worth money and efforts.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Never installed correctly...TERRIBLE customer service
customer_reviews.text: First, in general I follow instructions pretty well. That being said, I followed all directions to install this and could never get it to lock/unlock. Called their customer service and was on line with them from 9:19pm to 10:19pm until they got tired of helping me at which time they hung up. Followed all their directions, sent them pics on command, and all they could tell me is that sometimes Amazon sells previously owned items (presumably dysfunctional) as new items. I will obviously be seeking refund and will never trust August lock for anything. I buy tons of things through Amazon and don't know if I've ever returned an item. This is the first.
customer_reviews.author: stude09

customer_reviews.title: worked correctly for about 2 months...then became a liability.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to have this product, pumped about giving temporary keys and making sure it was locked after I left the house. That was short-lived. The hub never quite worked right. I gave up on that. The blue tooth still worked so I didn't think much of it. Then it started locking me out, I'd have to jiggle the handle and move the door around unlocking and relocking over and over till I got lucky. The final straw was when it locked my friend inside when I wasn't there. Despite our best efforts, the only way out of the apartment was to remove the lock completely.
customer_reviews.author: Troy McKittens

customer_reviews.title: August Connect Fail + New
customer_reviews.text: I have been using several August locks throughout my family home. One connect failed and proceeded to go through troubleshoot steps with their customer service. After determining the device had failed, a replacement one was sent. The new device did not work either. It was failing to connect to WIFI/Bluetooth (different problem from the original device). We went through numerous troubleshooting steps through email and phone + sending video proof of failure. Now they are asking me to do a video chat. I have to jump through hoops to prove that their devices are faulty! Shame on you August Lock! I have several locks and this is the kind of support that you offer? You lost a good lifetime customer.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: “JAMMED” and NO SUPPORT
customer_reviews.text: This lock worked great for 6 months. Now I can never lock the door unless inside and manually. Always says JAMMED and doesn’t work. Have tried recalibrating, can’t count the number of times, and still doesn’t work. Won’t lick and yet the app says lock successful. Support...there us no support. I’ve emailed customer service a 2-3times now and still no response. There isn’t a phone number to call. I think they gave their heads up you no where. DONT BUY this product if you want it to work after 6 months or want any support.
customer_reviews.author: Cz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bluetooth and WiFi lock. Zero issues, easy setup, ☆☆☆☆☆
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. Been using it for a while and it works flawlessly. Have had ZERO ISSUES. Very customizable and with the wifi connection makes it even better. Easy to install, easy to access battery compartment, and easy to use. Works with most regular circular deadbolts. It honestly took me about 10 minutes to install and another 10 - 20 minutes to setup, update firmware on the lock and calibrate. After that, you can set up an area range for when you leave. Auto lock and unlock. Provide ekeys to family and so on. Great stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry

customer_reviews.title: Won't fit on a glass panel back door
customer_reviews.text: Be warned that this lock has quite a large footprint! MUCH larger than expected. Check the specs. The big issue, however, is that there are 'wings' on either side of the lock that must be flipped up/open in order to install the lock. If your door doesn't have a wide enough area, then you won't be able to install the lock, even if the installed lock would fit on your door. I have a typical rear patio door with a glass insert. There isn't enough door space to accommodate the opened ready-to-install lock so I couldn't install it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great in perfect application.
customer_reviews.text: So far this has worked great. Have to remember to disengage auto lock when working in yard if I don't have my phone on me. The strike bolt has to line up almost perfectly or the lock won't engage. Worked great until the season change. Can't blame the lock, have always had issues with this door. Felt it was important to mention. My wife leaves about 2 hours before me on workdays. One day I went to leave and the lock was still trying to engage. Doesn't have the extra umph to engage when slightly out of alignment.
customer_reviews.author: Sean_RN

customer_reviews.title: Very easy installation & 24/7 Customer support
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install the hardware and the app. Had a hiccup with second user app working but contacted customer service for help. They were buys but I asked for a callback and within 30 mins Customer support walked us through getting the second phone app connected. We then used the August connect to allow Google and Alexa to operate the lock and all was good. The default setting was the door noise on and that caused our dogs to bark every time the door was locked or unlocked. An Unexpected security system. LOL We decided to turn the noise setting off and the dogs no longer bark.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would fully recomend this lock.
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to install. And it works perfect. I can control door feom around the world with this setup. And i can give permissions to other people in the house or give access for omly certain times of say for each person. It is very versatile. This was money well spent. I was done with my kids loosing keys. Oh and if there is an older person that isnt good with their phone they can use a key. I cant say enough about this product it has helped me so many times. I researched a lot of this type of lock before getting this one. Im glad i chose this one.
customer_reviews.author: neal

customer_reviews.title: Lock in my (phone) pocket
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Installed by a locksmith usually I'm handy but this has me stumped. He said I had striped a screw so it would never have worked. It is awesome. Locks on geofence schedule. I can give family a "key" they just need to download the app. They can have a forever key, or just for a set amount of hours it days. Works with alexa too. I just need to take phone out and unlock when I get home, even in geofence. Just make sure I take my phone when I leave!
customer_reviews.author: sevyna9

customer_reviews.title: Installation fail (see pictures)
customer_reviews.text: Be wary of installation if you have any raised molding close to your deadbolt location on the door. Due to a pretty significant design flaw, the unit has small wings that extend out and fold in to clamp the unit onto it's own base-plate. If the molding is too close, the fold out wing impinges on the molding making it impossible to attach. Not sure how this device made it through any kind of real world testing. I can't rate more than a one star as I was unable to actually install and use it. If they redesign it, I would certainly try this again as it is the device I need.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Giant Steaming Pile
customer_reviews.text: This thing doesn't really work. The Wi-Fi bridge doesn't work at all, which apparently is the case with several popular routers. If you switch phones, good luck getting logged into your new app. It'll just tell you over and over again that you have the wrong password, even after you reset it and paste in the new one. Even when the app functions, it's 50/50 whether it will auto-unlock your door when you get to the house. The batteries have to be replaced weekly. The pin code accessory works well. That's the only reason I don't give it 1 star. It's just an overpriced pin code lock.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Maroon

customer_reviews.title: If it works your gold. If not sol.
customer_reviews.text: For the first 3 months everything worked as advertised and was exactly what I needed to appease my HOA. However the lock suddenly started draining batteries and over the next few months I spent hours on the phone with customer care being asked rediculous questions that just put gas in the fire. I finally after almost 4 full months of complaining got a manager on the line who just sent me a replacement. Sure it came with expired batteries that didn't have a charge on them. But for the last week so far it's working. If I have any more issues I'll update and likely just uninstall the lock completely.
customer_reviews.author: 3dprintinggamer

customer_reviews.title: Offers Convenience and peace of mind.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. The app actually walks you thru the process and that was great. Purchased to allow us to lock door remotely especially useful in a house with young adult / teenage kids that tend to forget to lock the door when they’re “urgently” leaving for work or school. Great when in-laws or friends are arrive and we’re out grabbing extras at the convenience store for a BBQ. Takes batteries so I’ll have to see how often they require replacement. In short ownership only good things so far.
customer_reviews.author: J.Westrbook

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for renters
customer_reviews.text: I loved this lock. It allows you to install it over the existing lock, which landlords like because you aren't drilling anything and you aren't changing the keys. It worked very reliably. It prevented a lock-out/trip all the way back to work on more than one occasion. I never used auto lock/unlock. That's a feature for crazy people anyway. It's a security concern / lock out waiting to happen. I was able to easily uninstall it on my move out.
customer_reviews.author: will

customer_reviews.title: Great value, much cheaper than new generation and works just as well
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these from amazon renewed and they came brand new in the original package. Great deal since it saved me a couple hundred bucks. Very easy to install just like a standard deadbolt but, you can also find instructions in the app if you you've never done it. The connect works very well and allows me to open and close the doors when I'm outside the house. I did receive one black and one silver even tho I ordered 2 silver but, honestly I don't mind since it ended up working very good.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin Ibro

customer_reviews.title: I'm shocked nobody has died and there isn't a class action lawsuit over this thing
customer_reviews.text: This thing does not work when wifi isn't working. The manual function literally doesn't work as a default. I can't unlock it if wifi stops working for some reason. I'm shocked that this isn't the default function. I'm not sure what they were thinking that you can't just unlock the lock as a default from the inside, but it doesn't work. I couldn't unlock my own home and had to literally detach it from the door to open my front door. I'm not sure who designed this stupid thing but please don't buy this. Someone will inevitably die being trapped inside because they couldn't open the damn door because the wifi wasn't working.
customer_reviews.author: A Review

customer_reviews.title: Smart lock nice app
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Nice looking lock. Slightly bigger than I thought but fits perfectly. Integrates well with existing setup. Can still use key from outside. Timed autolock when you come in or leave. Alerts on your phone when door opens. Wifi bridge allows remote access. Quick install. The app! Cons: My only con is August lock doesn't integrate with my video doorbell by a competitor. That would make all the difference to me. Loving this thing though, would rebuy and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: FMK

customer_reviews.title: Fire hazard, not working properly, stay away.
customer_reviews.text: I have this lock for two years now, installed in two different houses. In the first house it worked fine. In the second house, it's been extremely inconsistent - sometimes it will lock, sometimes it won't. Sometimes it'll open the door, sometimes it won't. It's basically a locking roulette. In case you have to exit / enter the house quickly, there's a valid chance the lock won't operate - rendering you locked in/outside your own home. I contacted August team, more than once, but couldn't get the issue resolved. I now have a $200 paper holder, and no smart lock. I have a buddy that has the same issues exactly. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: oryoch

customer_reviews.title: Worked as advertised.  Installation was a little challenging.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the lock seems to work well. Setup with the phone app was easy. The color coded adapters didn't match the manufacturer. So, I just tried them all to get one to work. Also, I don't know if my Schlage is different than others but when opening the deadblock, it needs a little bit of tug to clockwise at the very end of the twisting motion to have the bolt fully recede. I calibrated the lock per the instructions and it seemed to do it the first time but stopped after that. I would imagine if others didn't have a larger gap as mine, it would get caught on the door. Just a word of caution, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: CU

customer_reviews.title: Fully regret this purchase, the lock is a constant headache, rarely works
customer_reviews.text: This thing has been nothing but a hassle the entire time we've owned it, nearly a year now. From day one it never connected consistently with the app, the app is very slow to open and always requires that I select our house even though there is only ONE August that we use. The home/away feature sounds nice but rarely works, and now our lock has developed an issue where it takes 3 to 5 tries to unlock literally every single time it's used. Going to toss this thing in the trash and go back to a regular lock. Not even vaguely worth the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: md

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my Smart Home
customer_reviews.text: The August Smart Lock was easy to install and setup. It integrated well with Alexa and Apple Home kit. Especially like that geofencing detects when I’m coming home and welcomes me and unlocks my door as I approach it. I was worried about battery life but a couple months in so far so good. My preference is to lock the door using Siri on my Apple Watch but, like many such devices, reliability using the watch could be better. Using Siri on my iPhone has been more reliable but, when in doubt, the August app on my phone has been very reliable. In summary, really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne W.

customer_reviews.title: Love the features / Love the product / Customer care? not so much
customer_reviews.text: Well, Few things. A) I LOVE LOVE LOVE this product - I think EVERYONE should own one. you will never forget to lock your door or forget to close your door. because it will let you know and it will auto-lock too! B) I think everyone should combine this with a video door bell - I have a ring but after my paid sub I will buy one of these brands because they offer free cloud storage for 24 hours Now, on the negative side, their CS is pretty bad. so know what you are doing and get stuff done yourself.
customer_reviews.author: rhcp011235

customer_reviews.title: works really good.
customer_reviews.text: what i like about this lock is the ability to know when the door is open and for how long the door is open. this is good due to my father in law who has dementia and some times tries to to slip out unnoticed, if during the night he tries to slip out i get an alert to my phone and if i am not home and he is, i get alerts any time the door is open. then the outside cameras alert me also. very good lock and bridge, they work really good together. i have no complaints as of today. 02/23/2020. i will update this post if needed.
customer_reviews.author: toughguy

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete review, but the only way to post pictures
customer_reviews.text: Never got a chance to fully install this because I didn't fully inspect my apartment's lock before purchasing. I'm only leaving a review because that's the only way (I can tell) to leave pictures and a warning. I've attached pics of my apartment's locks (it uses a key fob). I can ALMOST install this, but the screws that would keep the base in place have no where to go. I would have needed to completely remove my apartment's configuration. Otherwise, this would have been a super easy install, much easier than I anticipated. I'm sad that I can't use this tool yet (was excited about the guest keys) but oh well. Live and learn.
customer_reviews.author: Tavon

customer_reviews.title: Every feature works flawlessly
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this lock for about a month and it has been excellent. Every single feature works flawlessly, including with Alexa. It was super simple to install, just needed a screw driver. We used another smart lock by a different company in the past and this is leaps and bounds ahead. It is super easy to give guest access for a specified period of time for people visiting if they don’t mind downloading the app (which also works near perfectly). In any situation, the original deadbolt key can still be used. Overall I’d easily recommend this first to anyone looking into a smart lock.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: No Warranty support.
customer_reviews.text: The bridge unit fail, and I can't get any support. I tried email, computer chat and Voice system chat. None of them provide a real person support. Even the email, no real person see it. The reply email just send me to the support page to chat with the computer.
customer_reviews.author: Solomon Wu

customer_reviews.title: Poor build, a second has broken and I'm done
customer_reviews.text: Great concept and cool features but they must be using really cheap parts and crappy programmers. No children to abuse the locks however, a second one has now died, The first bricked itself and even customer service couldn't resolve when they tried to remote in (WTF knew they could remote in! Not very reassuring). The second is a mechanical failure and the lock can no longer turn the latch. After a software and hardware failure on two consecutive locks, I will not be rolling the dice on a third!
customer_reviews.author: Threes Up

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but install?
customer_reviews.text: Install was more complicated than they indicated on the packaging.... I have a dead bolt keyed on both sides, but this lock doesn't work with this lock. As it turns out, I had to replace the deadbolt anyway (that was the original problem) but the directions are not very clear for a less than handy-man... Once i replaced the deadbolt with a key on outside and flip on inside, install was a breeze.... Directions on app and on packaging leave a lot to be desired thus the reasons for the 4 instead of 5 star rating. Like the features of this unit
customer_reviews.author: Larryfinfan

customer_reviews.title: A very good remote lock solution
customer_reviews.text: This remote lock is used as a second lock for an office entrance, in order to provide a second layer of security on out of normal hours of operation and weekends, where the ability to program the auto lock-unlock is very handy as to be able to open the door at any time remotely. Easy to physically install and to connect to the bridge. The only suggestion is to make the bridge a bit more powerful, even when the bridge was very close, it took a bit for the lock to find it and pair, other than that everything is great.
customer_reviews.author: Polo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent smart lock that is highly functional
customer_reviews.text: A really good product which is easy to install as DIY and operate in a short period of time. The biggest advantage is that you can make the lock and door look as-is on the outside while it is actually a smart device on the inside. Auto-lock and unlock features that are built in work very well and are easily configurable. I would likely install another instance of this lock for another door in the house to control it for schedules. The wifi-bridge took a couple attempts to configure but once it was, it worked well and I only had issues when my Wifi was down and not with the lock and bridge.
customer_reviews.author: Srivats Ravichandran

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but integrations with IFTTT, Stringify, Harmony, Google Home and Alexa misleading
customer_reviews.text: Other reviewers have praised this product for easy installation, features, and support. Just be aware, that with IFTTT, August lock can only be used as a trigger, you can't lock it or unlock it. Same with Harmony. With Stringify, Alexa Skills and Google Home Routine, you cannot schedule an unlock, though Alexa and Google Home will allow you to unlock with voice command after responding to a security prompt (good idea). Either native or integration support for scheduled unlocking is a gaping hole.
customer_reviews.author: Meph2u

customer_reviews.title: smart lock of choice
customer_reviews.text: after seeing this device in an airbnb rental, I fell in love with this lock. I was about to install in my door without hassle and add my roommate as an authorized user. It was able to connect with my google home, homekit from apple, and the app is really easy to use. It works seamlessly with iphone. I wish august had more security apps likes nest and ring but I believe this easy to install smartlock was so easy to install. All I had to do was remove the cover of the lock and just mount this on my old lock.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Hipol

customer_reviews.title: Metal grinding noise
customer_reviews.text: The lock seems to work well. However, it has an issue where the central round plate that stays fixed and does not move catches on the rotating cylinder and makes metal grinding noise whether i open it by hand or via phone - it does not make the noise when I remove the round face plate. Kind of annoying to have a stupid mechanical issue with a fancy lock - it is like they could not get the basics right..... Anyone else has this issue? Did I get a defective unit or doing something wrong?
customer_reviews.author: BM

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have a second home that I need to provide remote access to and this product works awesome. I installed it in less the 15 min and it works like a charm.. the door is unlocked as your approach the door using its Bluetooth technology, I can lock or unlock and verify the door has been opened or closed from anywhere. And it’s not bad looking either. If you want a simple and reliable solution this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: docshots

customer_reviews.title: Failed after the first few weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Failed after the first few weeks. Now has to be reset after every use, rendering it pointless. Was awesome at first.
customer_reviews.author: tamazon

customer_reviews.title: Works great and easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to install and works great. I docked it one star, because the door sensor doesn't work on metal doors (this sensor is only to let you know if you left the door open, it doesn't effect the locking mechanism). Unfortunately, I set up the automatic door locking, then one day went outside without my phone and got locked out. Fortunately, I had added my children to the administration setting and they were able to unlock the door from Disneyland. Needless to say I turned off automatic locking.
customer_reviews.author: ShifterX

customer_reviews.title: Works Great Awesome Technician Installer
customer_reviews.text: The installation was paid for by Amazon so professional installation was free. Robbie from True Solution LLC was above and beyond great and did an awesome job. He installed the physical unit, then stayed while we stepped through the smartphone August App configuration and then the Alexa App configuration and then we tested with Bluetooth, then with Bluetooth off to test WIFI, then configured Alexa skill and tested door operation with Alexa. Totally satisfied awesome consumer experience. Highly recommend both the product and also the Amazon True Solutions LLC installer and Robbie.
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert L. Standen

customer_reviews.title: Great Lock - New, but seemingly a fantastic product.  Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: Great Lock - New, but seemingly a fantastic product. Very happy. With all locks like this, it's important to be sure the lock can close easily. Meaning, if there is any rub or resistance, it can affect the performance. That said, I'm only moderately handy and technically savvy, and this was a very doable set up. The instructions are SUPER easy to follow and very clear.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie N.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT lock!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been in love with my lock since day one. It was the easiest thing to install. Being a renter I didn’t have to worry with giving my landlord a key. When I lived near the hospital everyone would use my house as a place to rest. I didn’t have to worry about misplaced keys. August’s customer support is great. I emailed them with an issue concerning the WiFi bridge (Connect) and they were Johnny on the spot in resolving my issue.
customer_reviews.author: techick

customer_reviews.title: Good wireless connections are a must
customer_reviews.text: After some basic troubleshooting and product support, its finally working as expected. Youll have to play with the lock settings to adjust your auto lock timing. Luckily, the 'connect' wifi bridge and the lock are within 15 feet of our Xfinity high speed modem/router. And the 'door sense' magnet is very handy if your door is left ajar. Remember that your dead bolt can NOT be difficult to open as the motor of the lock can only handle so much torque.
customer_reviews.author: Conrad Chester

customer_reviews.title: Good luck getting support from these guys if something does not work!!
customer_reviews.text: If you plan to use this lock to connect to Alexa or Google Home I'd suggest you stay away. For the last 48 hours I have been trying to get a verification code that just does not turn up. Their Support is a darn joke... No one cares to reply. I used the first generation lock and was happy with it, hence decided to make this a part of my home automation process; worst decision ever.
customer_reviews.author: Kudige

customer_reviews.title: Does not work. Don't spend your money.
customer_reviews.text: For me, this was an extremely overpriced replacement for the inside half of my deadbolt, and added zero functionality + wasted my time. It doesn't work. When I connect to the lock on my phone app, it says it needs a firmware update. But the firmware update fails every time. I've tried for hours on two different devices with no luck. So I can't use the lock, except to turn the deadbolt. Which means my hundreds of dollars was completely wasted. I wish there was a 0/5 stars, because this doesn't even deserve 1. Calling support didn't help either. And they won't let me return the lock. 0/5 for the company, too.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Hsu

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay........ expensive though.
customer_reviews.text: Cool lock. Auto Unlock is a bit tricky to work with. Must set auto lock to at least 2 minutes or more or the lock will auto lock before you get to the door. If you set to immediate auto lock, the door will automatically lock when using Auto Unlock mode. Must set location to always. Only on some occasions will the door unlock when I get close to the door. I use it for my bedroom, so I don’t care when the door locks, but for a house that needs to immediately lock and unlock, I wouldn’t trust this device. Cool feature that you can use the phone to remotely lock and unlock the door.
customer_reviews.author: A B C  1 2 3

customer_reviews.title: Great remote doorlock
customer_reviews.text: Great lock, added it to existing Schlage deadbolt. Easy to install. But I went thru video install first. Would have been better to do while video is running. My fault because I'm the person who reads instructions before starting. Only issue I had was the door close sensor. Didn't work. Not sure if the dense door or magnet not strong enough. Anyway it works & I will install on backdoor as soon as funds allow
customer_reviews.author: Ray Kahler

customer_reviews.title: Bridge to WiFi a joke
customer_reviews.text: The bridge is 3 feet from the lock and 15 feet from the WiFi. Both Bluetooth and WiFi signals "tested" not strong enough, move the bridge. This is item going back if not resolved to my complete satisfaction. BTW got the FREE professional installation. He did all the things I could have done in about the same amount of time. I've waisted another hour to find out that the bridge apparently will not even communicate with a 5G system.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works, Wi-Fi bridge position is a struggle
customer_reviews.text: Wi-Fi bridge needs improvement, tried all outlets close by and none could get a good Bluetooth connection. Product description should emphasize Bluetooth only for the lock. Wi-Fi bridge for Apple HomeKit seems to be for status/notification only, to lock/unlock is only Bluetooth from your iPhone not Apple Watch. It sucks if your iPhone is not on you, can’t unlock with Siri on Apple Watch, had to open the lock app on watch and unlock. Maybe for security, but I don’t carry my phone all the time around the house.
customer_reviews.author: XT

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you have enough room to install it
customer_reviews.text: This looks like a nice device, but be warned that you must have at least 3/4" clearance between the August lock and any window frame or other obstacles to each side of it. The installation requires flipping small metal "wings" out, setting the unit in place and then flipping the wings back in. My door has a large light (window) in it, and the frame is close enough to the door lock that the wing hits it. As a result, it's not possible to install the lock on my door. None of the information about the lock mentions this space requirement. So, I'm returning the smart lock.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Great smart lock
customer_reviews.text: This lock has been awesome and tech support was super helpful. I have two littles and being able to lock and unlock my door when I pull in to my driveway is super helpful. The app didn’t sync correctly when I set up the lock the first time, but tech support was able to see the issue quickly and help me resolve it in under 5 min. Installing the lock was super easy as well. It looks wonky but I am used to it and love the peace of mind of knowing when the door is opened and closed with door sense.
customer_reviews.author: Kyla Niva

customer_reviews.title: No fumbling for keys anymore
customer_reviews.text: August Smart Lock was easy to install. And App setup wasn’t too bad. I love the unlock feature which activates as I pull in the driveway. No more fumbling for keys when you have your hands full as you approach the door. The Alexa integration works well... the app works well too... Beware of the auto lock feature... you can set it to auto lock, let’s say 30 seconds after you walk out and shut the door... so if your taking the garbage out... bring your phone... I prefer to disable that function and lock the door thru the app...
customer_reviews.author: NP520

customer_reviews.title: When its working its great but sadly that’s only 10% of the time
customer_reviews.text: I tried to enjoy this product I really did. The first lock I received had Bluetooth issues that I sent into support and they promptly sent me a new one. The second one worked great for a little bit then slowing would die out and unable to connect. Thank god for backup keys or I would have been locked out of the house numerous times because the app would never connect. Sadly, after two different locks and having the same problem on two different modern phones its safe to say the locks are the problem. I will say when the product IS working its fantastic 10/10 but that rarely ever happens.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great Automated Lock
customer_reviews.text: This lock is wonderful. It attaches right over your current deadbolt lock (on the inside of the door) and offers automation. You can still use your key if you wish and there is nothing on the outside of the house to mount. No keypads or mechanics. Works perfectly with Alexa or the app on your phone. The app uses either we-fi or Bluetooth - selects automatically! Don't hesitate on this one - its a no-brainer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Poor Battery Life Compared to Competitors
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. It is nice that the outer portion and key from look remains the same. I do find that the battery life is significantly worse than my Schlage connect smartlock. I have to replace the batteries in the August every 2 to 6 weeks where as the batteries in the Schlage (also AAs) have lasted over year. There are no issues with the fit of the lock and it turns easily without any friction. Not sure why battery life is so poor. It also doesn’t tell you what the battery level is in the app and once the battery is low enough to give an warning it usually won’t function anymore.
customer_reviews.author: D L

customer_reviews.title: I am loyal to this brand.
customer_reviews.text: August locks is my go to brand for smart locks. This is the second home I have installed these in. I love how I can set it to autolock when left unlocked. Perfect for my husband who constantly leaves doors unlocked when he leaves. I also like how it monitors who is unlocking the door and when. Great for parents. It was easy to install. With the Connect I can unlock and lock the door from anywhere. Great feature if you have a doorbell camera as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jason & Juan

customer_reviews.title: August locks are awesome, the connect is very finicky
customer_reviews.text: This is our second August lock and I was excited to see the Prime day deal because I only had the regular model before. It's now in the basement so we can get in easily when doing yard work. These install in no time at all. The longest task is finding the best connect bluetooth signal strength. I was happy to get a pro because they also support Z-Wave. I have this linked both to the August website with a Connect and also in my Hubitat. That means I can see the front door traffic and open/close locally and use it in rules.
customer_reviews.author: Jeneva Samples

customer_reviews.title: Great but huge!
customer_reviews.text: These work amazing. we have two installed and a third for our daughter. Aside from being just huge in general, they work great and integration is simple. The new one comes out this summer that is smaller. We highly recommend this lock. Does NOT look like a smart lock from outside which we love. very simple operation and we added a keypad off to the side out of site just in case we forgot a phone! they are great locks and support it good. :)
customer_reviews.author: jmoar

customer_reviews.title: I may need a replacement coz mine doesn’t work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The idea is great, but the August smart lock pro is not delivering. Yes, it’s pretty easy to instal EXCEPT the part when they don’t have the proper adapter for the Defiant brand deadbolt. Secondly, it beeps and does not unlock properly as if it’s jamming up. I watch a YouTube video hoping to help me fix this but this seems to be a common problem. Can I get a replacement with the correct adapter please? I currently Mcgyver’d it to be able to use the green adapter to work manually.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Connect Hub is bad
customer_reviews.text: The August Connect hub won't connect to the Smart Lock Pro over Bluetooth. The setup app is saying to move the August Connect closer to the Smart Lock Pro. However, it's only 3'-6" away in direct line of sight. How bad can the Bluetooth hardware be that it can't connect at 3' away, and who has an outlet closer than 3 feet to a door, anyway? So much time wasted trying to make it work. So incredibly frustrating. I see, reading the reviews that this is a very common problem. That's great. Just great.
customer_reviews.author: Skip Whiffle

customer_reviews.title: Meh. It works
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I locked myself out of my house for 4 hours with a 1 year old baby in the cold. I can say that with this I really don't have to worry about that anymore. I'm not really fancy, so I'm not hard to please. As long as it works I guess. Good: 1. Keyless entry 2. Smart Phone enabled Bad: 1. Ugly design 2. Weird mechanics - sometimes gets jammed, doesn't open the door, or doesn't lock all the way 3. Can still be picked I do regret my choice of locks, I kinda wish I would have purchased a Yale, but at the same time, it does its job therefore I'm relatively happy.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonBro

customer_reviews.title: Horrible access verification.
customer_reviews.text: Both my daughter and I hate this product. If you get a new phone, good luck reinstalling it to get access. It’s impossible and frustrating and we will never recommend this product to anyone. It keeps saying it can’t verify us after sending several codes to both email and text. It’s pointless.
customer_reviews.author: rick

customer_reviews.title: Love this lock!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic addition to a your smart home! The setup is very quick and easy. Download the app and follow the instructions. Love the auto away feature which locks the door when you leave a defined area, and when you return, it unlocks for you as well. Very handy when you return home and have your arm full, no fumbling around to get out your keys. Although a great feature, it would be great if they 'tightened' up the defined area. Doesn't lock until I get out of my subdivision.
customer_reviews.author: CMHWolf

customer_reviews.title: Best smartlock available
customer_reviews.text: I have tried Schlage and Kwikset smart locks and this one is by far the best quality and easiest to setup. The app is very user friendly. You can tell a lot of thought was put into the design. The quality is top notch and feel very secure. It’s also nice that there is no way to Tell from the exterior that there is a smartlock on the door. The only thing that’s a little weird is the sensor that does on the door frame to track the motion of the dial to Indicate that it’s locked or unlocked. It’s a little weird having it stil out like It does. Other than that it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: EKanas

customer_reviews.title: Great smart lock! Not so great Alexa integration
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this lock last summer because we found ourselves locking each other out from time to time as well as forgetting keys in the house when going out. This was super easy to install and use via the mobile app, however the Alexa integration is poor and isn’t straightforward like most other IOT devices. On the other bright side it updates itself with the latest software releases without any interaction from us. Overall though, I am very please with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shoppoholic

product_meta.title: August Home August Smart Lock Pro + Connect with Wi-Fi Bridge, Dark Gray. Zwave, HomeKit & Alexa Compatible
product_meta.description: Color Name:Dark Gray| Style:with ConnectControl and monitor your door from anywhere.
feature_bullets: Works with Alexa for voice control (Alexa device sold separately). Wireless requirements-2.4GHertz Wi-Fi network (Connect Wi-Fi Bridge sold separately)

Control and monitor your door from anywhere. Lock and unlock your door, control keyless access and keep track of who comes and goes, all from your phone. Alexa can also provide notifications when your battery is running low so you can proactively replace them. Set up smart reorders through dash replenishment to make sure you always have replacement batteries when you need them.
Be sure you’re secure with DoorSense. Only August has DoorSense to tell you if your door is securely closed and locked. Holding force: 600 pounds
Always know who is coming and going. Track activity at your doorstep with a 24/7 activity feed
Keep your existing lock and keys. Easily attaches to your existing deadbolt; Use your existing keys at anytime. Requires 110 to 240 volts

Locks automatically behind you, and unlocks as you approach. Requires iOS (9.0 or higher) or Android (5.0 or higher) smartphones. Retrofit installation works with most standard single cylinder deadbolts
Simple, DIY installation. Install in about 10 minutes with just a screwdriver
